Package PART1

Class MailBox

java.lang.Object
PART1.MailBox
Direct Known Subclasses:
MailBox2
public class MailBox
extends java.lang.Object
Mailbox Class that has a Store, User and its list of messages

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MailBox​(MailStore store, User user)
    Creates a mailbox for an User, it needs a store, and the user.

  • Method Summary
